WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

when I try to do this:

this._items = List<T>._emptyArray;
I got this error:
A parameter list must follow a generic type argument list. '(' expected.

_emptyArray is a static member. With List._emptyArray, all is ok.
Isnt it implemented or not important whether List<T> or List? I know the outputed js code should be the same, but I write TypeScript.

Regards
Chris
WorkItem.Summary: Call a static method on a generic type.
